Rulings.Base:
1. If you have multiple copies of this card in your GY, you can't activate the effects of any more than one because it's no longer the start of your Standby Phase after the first one resolves.
2. If you don't control a "Nordic" monster when this effect resolves, you still Special Summon Mimir.
3. Sending 1 Spell Card to the GY is a cost.
4. This effect does not target.

PSCT.Base: Once per turn, at the start of your Standby Phase, if you control a "Nordic" monster and this card is in your GY: You can send 1 Spell from your hand to the GY; Special Summon this card.
